Overview
=========

The GLDrawer is a simple rendering tool that allows you to create a window, or an embedded view in which you can render a variety of graphical elements.
GLDrawer is used through C#, but doesn not require knowledge of how graphics work and is easy to learn with.

In addition to being a learning tool for coding, GLDrawer can even be used to create simple games with the built in tools!
To get started using GLDrawer, continue to the Quick Start page to learn how to install it.
